channel.title: Online Server Help
channel.description: Ok plz help me theres a big problem with my server. When i go onto my website and click on play webclient I get this message:Error Connecting To Server Well I know that the problem has to do with my source and run-server.bat. When I run the game with my run-server.bat it works perfect but I cant give my source to people because then they can hack the server. Please help me I dont know how to fix this plz respond quickly. Please help I will reward admin for my server to the person who helps me fix this. Plz help me!!!!!!!!!!

item.title: Online Server Help
item.dc:creator: @blckranger11 blckranger11
item.description:
@blckranger11 wrote:

Ok plz help me theres a big problem with my server. When i go onto my website and click on play webclient I get this message:Error Connecting To Server
Well I know that the problem has to do with my source and run-server.bat. When I run the game with my
run-server.bat it works perfect but I cant give my source to people because then they can hack the server. Please help me I dont know how to fix this plz respond quickly. Please help I will reward admin for my server to the person who helps me fix this. Plz help me!!!

Read full topic
